pages.text: Servants summoned by either Rituals or Spells tend to share some attributes with each other. For starters, they attack all kinds of Hostile Creatures, they won't attack each other if they share an Summoner, they have a limited lifespan and a limit on how many Servants a Summoner can have.

However, certain types of servants last forever if their summoner dons a associated crown and they can use their summoner's Soul Energy to heal themselves (provided they're not on fire) if said summoner wears the associated robe or, in the case of undead servants, Necro Cape. Undead Servants will burn in sunlight when not wearing a Helmet.

Servants can teleport to their Summoner if their summoner has their Focus equipped to their wands and cast the spell when crouching. If the summoned Servant is not a Vex, hitting them (or, if enabled through config, right click on them) with a $(l:intro/dark_wand)Wand$()/Staff will either make them follow the Summoner, wander around the area or stay put.
